greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A215029(A000040(n)), where A000040(n) is the n-th prime.
comment: For primes whose value is 0, see A214912; for value 1 see A031215; and for value 2 see A215031.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: A215029(n) = if(n<=2,n,my(mp=precprime(n-1),d=n); while(mp>0, if(d>0, d -= mp, d += mp); mp = precprime(mp-1)); (d));
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 05 2012
